source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH CTE1 AS (
  SELECT
    V.EQUIP_NO,
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
    V.EQUIP_DESP, 
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_DESP, 
    E.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    xls_v_Equipment_Registration V
    inner join EI_EQUIPMENT E on E.EQUIP_NO = V.EQUIP_NO
  WHERE
    (
      (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MST%'
        AND V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'EI%'
      )
      OR (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MSI%'
        AND (
          V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIX%'
          OR V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIY%'
        )
      )
    )
), CTE2 AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN(W.PLAN_START_DATE) AS PLAN_START_DATE, 
    W.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    WM_WORK_ORDER W 
    left join SA_WORK_GRP S on S.WK_GRP_ID = W.WK_GRP_ID
    inner join CTE1 C1 on C1.EQUIP_ID = W.EQUIP_ID
  WHERE
    W.CREATE_DATE >= DATEADD(MONTH, -12, GETDATE())
    and S.WK_GRP_ID in (
      SELECT
        WK_GRP_ID 
      FROM 
        SA_WORK_GRP 
      WHERE 
        WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%'
    )
    and W.STATUS = 'OP'
    --and W.PLAN_START_DATE >= GETDATE()
  GROUP BY
    W.EQUIP_ID
)
SELECT
  C1.*, 
  C2.PLAN_START_DATE
FROM
  CTE1 C1 
  left join CTE2 C2 on C2.EQUIP_ID = C1.EQUIP_ID
WHERE
C1.EQUIP_NO is not null
ORDER BY
  C1.EQUIP_NO

WITH CTE1 AS (
  SELECT
    V.EQUIP_NO,
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
    V.EQUIP_DESP, 
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_DESP, 
    E.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    xls_v_Equipment_Registration V
    inner join EI_EQUIPMENT E on E.EQUIP_NO = V.EQUIP_NO
  WHERE
    (
      (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MST%'
        AND V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'EI%'
      )
      OR (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MSI%'
        AND (
          V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIX%'
          OR V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIY%'
        )
      )
    )
), CTE2 AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN(W.PLAN_START_DATE) AS PLAN_START_DATE, 
    W.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    WM_WORK_ORDER W 
    left join SA_WORK_GRP S on S.WK_GRP_ID = W.WK_GRP_ID
    inner join CTE1 C1 on C1.EQUIP_ID = W.EQUIP_ID
  WHERE
    W.CREATE_DATE >= DATEADD(MONTH, -12, GETDATE())
    and S.WK_GRP_ID in (
      SELECT
        WK_GRP_ID 
      FROM 
        SA_WORK_GRP 
      WHERE 
        WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%'
    )
    and W.STATUS = 'OP'
    --and W.PLAN_START_DATE >= GETDATE()
  GROUP BY
    W.EQUIP_ID
)
SELECT
  C1.*, 
  C2.PLAN_START_DATE
FROM
  CTE1 C1 
  left join CTE2 C2 on C2.EQUIP_ID = C1.EQUIP_ID
WHERE
C1.EQUIP_NO is not null
ORDER BY
  C1.EQUIP_NO
